meaningMnemonic: The Japanese <kanji>emperor</kanji> is supposed to have come from the <kanji>heaven</kanji>s, so that just makes this heaven emperor the <vocabulary>emperor of Japan</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You just have to remember that 皇 is read as のう here. You just found out you can never be the Emperor of Japan because you aren't Japanese. <reading>NOOOOOOOOOOOOO</reading>~ (のう).
